mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_FILE (FILE_ID,STORAGE_SE,SAVE_PATH,SAVE_FILE_NM,FILE_NM,FILE_EXTSN,FILE_SIZE,USE_YN,RGST_ID,RGST_DT,MODI_ID,MODI_DT,BUCKET_NM,FILE_URL,FILE_CL,REF_ID,ATMC_DEL_YN,ATMC_DEL_DT) VALUES (#{fileId},#{storageSe},#{savePath},#{saveFileNm},#{fileNm},#{fileExtsn},#{fileSize},'Y',#{rgstId},NOW(),#{modiId},NOW(),#{bucketNm},#{fileUrl},#{fileCl},#{refId} , CASE WHEN #{fileSize} > (SELECT CODE_NM FROM T_CODE WHERE GROUP_ID = 'FILE' AND CODE_ID = 'LIMIT') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END , CASE WHEN #{fileSize} > (SELECT CODE_NM FROM T_CODE WHERE GROUP_ID = 'FILE' AND CODE_ID = 'LIMIT') THEN CURRENT_DATE + (SELECT CODE_NM FROM T_CODE WHERE GROUP_ID = 'FILE' AND CODE_ID = 'PD') ELSE NULL END )
